POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://demoqa.com/Account/v1/user path_url=/Account/v1/user headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '64'} body=b'{"userName": "ninja_for_testing_ZENu9", "password": "Test@1234"}'
